TEXT.TITLE: LOCKHEED <LK> UNIT GETS 275 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY:
Lockheed Corp's Lockheed Missiles and Space Co is being awarded a 275 mln dlr modification to a Navy contract for development and production of Trident II missiles, the Defense Department said. It said work on the contract is expected to be completed in March 1990.
Reuter
